org.dsngroup.broke.client

Class BlockClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsngroup.broke.client.BlockClient

  • public class BlockClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The BlockClient should be deprecated after the asynchronous client is implemented. Only used for test!
